description: Uploaded by https://gitlab.com/gitlab-com/runbooks/-/jobs/4757416433 at Fri Jul 28 03:24:28 UTC 2023

targets.expr:
sum(
  sum by (type)(
    sum_over_time(gitlab:availability:success:rate_1h{environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="api"}[$__range]) * $api_weight
  )
  or
  sum by (type)(
    sum_over_time(gitlab:availability:success:rate_1h{environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="ci-runners"}[$__range]) * $ci_runners_weight
  )
  or
  sum by (type)(
    sum_over_time(gitlab:availability:success:rate_1h{environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="git"}[$__range]) * $git_weight
  )
  or
  sum by (type)(
    sum_over_time(gitlab:availability:success:rate_1h{environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="internal-api"}[$__range]) * $internal_api_weight
  )
  or
  sum by (type)(
    sum_over_time(gitlab:availability:success:rate_1h{environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="registry"}[$__range]) * $registry_weight
  )
  or
  sum by (type)(
    sum_over_time(gitlab:availability:success:rate_1h{environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="sidekiq"}[$__range]) * $sidekiq_weight
  )
  or
  sum by (type)(
    sum_over_time(gitlab:availability:success:rate_1h{environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="web"}[$__range]) * $web_weight
  )
  or
  sum by (type)(
    sum_over_time(gitlab:availability:success:rate_1h{environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="web-pages"}[$__range]) * $web_pages_weight
  )
)
/
sum(
  sum by (type)(
    sum_over_time(gitlab:availability:ops:rate_1h{environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="api"}[$__range]) * $api_weight
  )
  or
  sum by (type)(
    sum_over_time(gitlab:availability:ops:rate_1h{environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="ci-runners"}[$__range]) * $ci_runners_weight
  )
  or
  sum by (type)(
    sum_over_time(gitlab:availability:ops:rate_1h{environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="git"}[$__range]) * $git_weight
  )
  or
  sum by (type)(
    sum_over_time(gitlab:availability:ops:rate_1h{environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="internal-api"}[$__range]) * $internal_api_weight
  )
  or
  sum by (type)(
    sum_over_time(gitlab:availability:ops:rate_1h{environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="registry"}[$__range]) * $registry_weight
  )
  or
  sum by (type)(
    sum_over_time(gitlab:availability:ops:rate_1h{environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="sidekiq"}[$__range]) * $sidekiq_weight
  )
  or
  sum by (type)(
    sum_over_time(gitlab:availability:ops:rate_1h{environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="web"}[$__range]) * $web_weight
  )
  or
  sum by (type)(
    sum_over_time(gitlab:availability:ops:rate_1h{environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="web-pages"}[$__range]) * $web_pages_weight
  )
)

(
  1 - (
    sum(
      sum by (type)(
        sum_over_time(gitlab:availability:success:rate_1h{environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="api"}[$__range]) * $api_weight
      )
      or
      sum by (type)(
        sum_over_time(gitlab:availability:success:rate_1h{environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="ci-runners"}[$__range]) * $ci_runners_weight
      )
      or

      )
      or
      sum by (type)(
        sum_over_time(gitlab:availability:success:rate_1h{environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="registry"}[$__range]) * $registry_weight
      )
      or
      sum by (type)(
        sum_over_time(gitlab:availability:success:rate_1h{environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="sidekiq"}[$__range]) * $sidekiq_weight
      )
      or
      sum by (type)(
        sum_over_time(gitlab:availability:success:rate_1h{environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="web"}[$__range]) * $web_weight
      )
      or
      sum by (type)(
        sum_over_time(gitlab:availability:success:rate_1h{environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="web-pages"}[$__range]) * $web_pages_weight
      )
    )
    /
    sum(
      sum by (type)(
        sum_over_time(gitlab:availability:ops:rate_1h{environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="api"}[$__range]) * $api_weight
      )
      or
      sum by (type)(
        sum_over_time(gitlab:availability:ops:rate_1h{environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="ci-runners"}[$__range]) * $ci_runners_weight
      )
      or
      sum by (type)(
        sum_over_time(gitlab:availability:ops:rate_1h{environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="git"}[$__range]) * $git_weight
      )
      or
      sum by (type)(
        sum_over_time(gitlab:availability:ops:rate_1h{environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="internal-api"}[$__range]) * $internal_api_weight
      )
      or
      sum by (type)(
        sum_over_time(gitlab:availability:ops:rate_1h{environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="registry"}[$__range]) * $registry_weight
      )
      or
      sum by (type)(
        sum_over_time(gitlab:availability:ops:rate_1h{environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="sidekiq"}[$__range]) * $sidekiq_weight
      )
      or
      sum by (type)(
        sum_over_time(gitlab:availability:ops:rate_1h{environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="web"}[$__range]) * $web_weight
      )
      or
      sum by (type)(
        sum_over_time(gitlab:availability:ops:rate_1h{environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="web-pages"}[$__range]) * $web_pages_weight
      )
    )
  )
) * $__range_ms

panels.description: Availability over time, higher is better.

targets.expr:
clamp_min(clamp_max(clamp_max(
  clamp_min(
    sum(
      sum by (type)(
        sum_over_time(gitlab:availability:success:rate_1h{environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="api"}[$__interval]) * $api_weight
      )
      or
      sum by (type)(
        sum_over_time(gitlab:availability:success:rate_1h{environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="ci-runners"}[$__interval]) * $ci_runners_weight
      )
      or
      sum by (type)(
        sum_over_time(gitlab:availability:success:rate_1h{environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="git"}[$__interval]) * $git_weight
      )
      or
      sum by (type)(
        sum_over_time(gitlab:availability:success:rate_1h{environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="internal-api"}[$__interval]) * $internal_api_weight
      )
      or
      sum by (type)(
        sum_over_time(gitlab:availability:success:rate_1h{environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="registry"}[$__interval]) * $registry_weight
      )
      or
      sum by (type)(
        sum_over_time(gitlab:availability:success:rate_1h{environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="sidekiq"}[$__interval]) * $sidekiq_weight
      )
      or
      sum by (type)(
        sum_over_time(gitlab:availability:success:rate_1h{environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="web"}[$__interval]) * $web_weight
      )
      or
      sum by (type)(
        sum_over_time(gitlab:availability:success:rate_1h{environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="web-pages"}[$__interval]) * $web_pages_weight
      )
    )
    /
    sum(
      sum by (type)(
        sum_over_time(gitlab:availability:ops:rate_1h{environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="api"}[$__interval]) * $api_weight
      )
      or
      sum by (type)(
        sum_over_time(gitlab:availability:ops:rate_1h{environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="ci-runners"}[$__interval]) * $ci_runners_weight
      )
      or
      sum by (type)(
        sum_over_time(gitlab:availability:ops:rate_1h{environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="git"}[$__interval]) * $git_weight
      )
      or
      sum by (type)(
        sum_over_time(gitlab:availability:ops:rate_1h{environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="internal-api"}[$__interval]) * $internal_api_weight
      )
      or
      sum by (type)(
        sum_over_time(gitlab:availability:ops:rate_1h{environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="registry"}[$__interval]) * $registry_weight
      )
      or
      sum by (type)(
        sum_over_time(gitlab:availability:ops:rate_1h{environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="sidekiq"}[$__interval]) * $sidekiq_weight
      )
      or
      sum by (type)(
        sum_over_time(gitlab:availability:ops:rate_1h{environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="web"}[$__interval]) * $web_weight
      )
      or
      sum by (type)(
        sum_over_time(gitlab:availability:ops:rate_1h{environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="web-pages"}[$__interval]) * $web_pages_weight
      )
    ),
    0
  ),

)
